'''[[Planex]]''''s drivers reference two devices (1435:0210 [A021] and 14ea:3001 [A022]). 
 %A021_DESC_STR%     = PRISM_A021,        USB\VID_1435&PID_0210
 %A022_DESC_STR%     = PRISM_A022,        USB\VID_14EA&PID_3001

 A021_DESC_STR           = "PLANEX GW-US54S 54Mbps Wireless LAN USB Adapter"
 A022_DESC_STR           = "PLANEX GW-US54S 54Mbps Wireless LAN USB Adapter"
Appears to be a Wistron NeWeb device... maybe the UR054g. ID is probably 1435:0210. [[Category:English Documentation]]
